page.title: 20Domesday Survey Credits
page.content: {St. George's First School.}Staff:Carol Mathieson & Sally Fowler.Pupils: Class 4, especially Alison Titley, Bablu Miah & Richard Davies. {Franche First School.}Staff:Edward Lloyd-Jones & Mary Worthington. Pupils:Classes 5 & 6, especially Jayne Edwards, Laura Phoenix, Zanna Weale, Lorraine Osborne & Andrea Goldsmith. {St.John's Middle School.}Staff: Vicki Thomas-Cox.Pupils:Class B5, especially Mark Breakwell, Simon Halford, Leila Keady, Susan Yapp, Wendy Atkinson and Caroline Jester. {Franche Middle School.}Staff: Cottia Howard. Pupils: Class 2K, especially Richard Cooke, Philip Whitfield, Emma Hiscocks,Mark Stanley,Russell Wilding, Leanne Oldnall, Matthew Newey, Peter Rhodes and Georgina Bye. {Photographs}taken by the{Rev.Stephen {Oram,}Curate of St. John's Church.
